train.question: Write a C program to perform matrix multiplication for two 2D arrays.
Write code to compute the dot product of two vectors.
Write a program to compute the prefix sum (scan) of an array.
Write code to simulate one step of the 2D Jacobi iteration.
Write a program to compute a histogram from an array of integer values.
Write code to transpose a square matrix.
Write a program to perform a convolution operation on a 2D array using a 3x3 kernel.
Write code to perform numerical integration using the trapezoidal rule.
Write a program to calculate the average of elements in a large array.
Write code to simulate the N-body problem using pairwise force calculations.
